data.text: @TactNowInfo @NoyesJHumphrey We need a sad emoticon for this.

@TactNowInfo @NoyesJHumphrey I’m having a hard time finding percentage of BA.2 cases in the US and in each state. Any suggestions as to where to find that data? And how accurate is the data if it escapes some testing. Does it escape antigen or PCR testing?
@aferraz74 But if infected with COVID, orders of magnitude worse than vax. Lose, lose bigger.
@aferraz74 In those over 70 yrs old, then yes. Under 70, if autoimmune already then yes.
